column2:
"Hmph, you sure are raring to go, aren't you?
But can you really use techniques?
I mean, you ARE a loser, after all."

"The Darkers are crawling forth in swarms,
so it'll be dangerous if you don't take it seriously."

"I'll be watching to see if you stay the right
distance away from those hostiles and
calmly pelt them with techniques. Loser."

"ふーん、やる気は充分みたいだね。
でもアンタ、へっぽこぴーだけど
ちゃんとテクニック使えるの？"

"ダーカーは群れでウジャウジャ来るから
慎重に行かないと危ないよーん。"

"ダーカーから充分に距離を取って
落ち着いて法撃を放てるか
私、しっかり見てるからね！"
